rounds.comments: (Alex: Hey, this Sunday is [*], so remember to call Mom.)

clues.text: This type of "mom" drives her kids around in an SUV to their sporting activities--one sport in particular

rounds.text: 1 of 2 consecutive "Best Pictures"--1949 & 1950--whose titles begin with "All"
rounds.response: (1 of) All the King's Men or All About Eve
